dateplot1.title: Chamber pressure
dateplot1.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_mgw where type = 60 and value > 0 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot2.title: Pirani, buffer volume
dateplot2.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_mgw where type = 61 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot3.title: Reactor pressure
dateplot3.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_mgw where type = 69 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot4.title: Reactor temperature
dateplot4.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_mgw where type = 140 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot5.title: RTD temperature
dateplot5.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_mgw where type = 141 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot6.title: T, Ch01
dateplot6.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_mgw where type = 210 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot7.title: T, Ch02
dateplot7.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_mgw where type = 211 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot8.title: T, Ch03
dateplot8.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_mgw where type = 212 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot9.title: T, Ch04
dateplot9.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_mgw where type = 213 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot10.title: T, Ch05
dateplot10.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_mgw where type = 214 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot11.title: T, Ch06
dateplot11.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_mgw where type = 215 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot12.title: T, Ch07
dateplot12.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_mgw where type = 216 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot13.title: Turbo, Main Chamber, Motor Temp
dateplot13.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_mgw where type = 62 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot14.title: Turbo, Main Chamber, Electronics Temp
dateplot14.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_mgw where type = 67 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot15.title: Turbo, Main Chamber, Temp Bottom
dateplot15.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_mgw where type = 65 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot16.title: Turbo, Main Chamber, Bearings Temp
dateplot16.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_mgw where type = 66 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot17.title: Turbo, Main chamber, rotation
dateplot17.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_mgw where type = 64 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot18.title: Turbo, Main chamber, Current
dateplot18.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_mgw where type = 63 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot19.title: Turbo, Main chamber, Power
dateplot19.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_mgw where type = 68 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

queries.default: SELECT x/1000,y FROM xy_values_microreactorNG where measurement = {id} order by id
SELECT x,y FROM xy_values_microreactorNG where measurement = {id} order by id
